import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import LoginModal from "../LoginModal"; import search from "../../assets/images/svg/search.svg"; const Header = () => { const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); // Define state for modal visibility const toggleModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(!isModalOpen); }; return (
{/* Logo */} Edu Market {/* Navigation */}
  • Home
  • Instructor
  • Course
  • Contacts
{/* Header Buttons */}
); }; export default Header;
